summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4676 for the improvement of the alley in block 13, Greene's Addition, et al., being the alley from East Lynn Street to Louisa Street, between Eastlake Avenue and Yale Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54230, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
